group_1.textCenter: From the moment that we're born,
it's been decided for us whether it's better@to be a good person or a bad person.
The vile cannot live among the virtuous,@nor the virtuous among the vile.
You may have lived among the good once, but...
You've been turned around@past the point of no return.

group_1.narration: I became evil in order to survive,@but I ended up back in a world that I can't live in.
That's why I decided to keep my relationship@with that woman plain and dry.@I won't do anything more than I have to,@and I won't hang out with her in private.
As for being nice, that's something I@absolutely should never have done.

group_1.textRight: Alright, congrats on passing your high@school equivalency exam!
But are you sure about this?@To keep on working part-time...

group_1.textLeft: I was thinking about moving out@and living on my own.

group_1.textRight: Livia, it feels like at a certain point,@you started keeping your distance.
We still talk as usual, and you@help me out with things,
but it feels like you're trying to distance@yourself from everyone, not just me.

group_1.textLeft: I don't like people much to begin with, so I'm@just keeping a reasonable distance.
Teach... Can you please not@dig into this any further?

group_1.textRight: So you're moving next month, then?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. I've already found a place,@so all I've gotta do is pack my bags.

group_1.textRight: I'll leave you my address, so feel free@to reach out to me anytime.
I'd also like to know where you're moving to.

group_1.textLeft: I'll send it to you when I feel like it.

group_1.textRight: You know, Livia, you're someone special to me.

group_1.textLeft: Where is this coming from all of a sudden...?

group_1.textRight: You were the first child I was ever put@in charge of after taking this job.
Sorry, I know there's no sense in talking@about personal matters like this.

group_1.narration: I really wanted to comfort her. I wanted to@thank her for everything she'd done.
But the closer I got to her,@the more I worried about what kind of awful@heart-rending fate would be visited upon her.
So I tried my best to keep my distance,@to treat her coldly. That was the greatest@kindness I could offer her.
I fell out of contact with her after that,@and moved out without reaching out to her.
I got work at convenience stores,@and spent my days supporting Magical Girls,@gradually refining my Coordination magic.

I didn't want to be an evil person in a world@of good people, so I lived life in a placid state,@acting with neither good nor ill intentions.@It made me realize just how dull life is@when you can't move one way or the other.
